product_name: Sea to Summit Nylon Pocket Trowel
long_description: The rugged Sea To Summit Nylon pocket trowel makes backcountry bathroom trips a breeze. Reinforced nylon plastic is tough enough to dig holes in hard ground; withstands cold temperatures. Pop the rear cap off to store toilet paper, lighter or hand sanitizer in the hollow handle. Handle collapses to fit within the blade for compact storage. Sea To Summit promotes following Leave No Trace principles while traveling in the backcountry.
short_description: The rugged Sea To Summit Nylon pocket trowel makes backcountry bathroom trips a breeze.
